name: Sky Rojo
summary_text: Coral, Wendy, and Gina go on the run in search of freedom while being chased by Romeo, their pimp from Las Novias Club, and his henchmen, Moises and Christian.

name: Tammy and the T-Rex
summary_text: An evil scientist implants the brain of Michael, a murdered high school student, into a Tyrannosaurus. He escapes, wreaks vengeance on his high school tormentors, and is reunited with his sweetheart Tammy.

name: Frankenstein
summary_text: When the brilliant but unorthodox scientist Dr. Victor Frankenstein rejects the artificial man that he has created, the Creature escapes and later swears revenge.

name: Sister Act 2: Back in the Habit
summary_text: Showgirl Deloris Van Cartier returns as Sister Mary Clarence to teach music to a group of Catholic students whose run-down school is slated for closure.

name: Duel
summary_text: A business commuter is pursued and terrorized by the malevolent driver of a massive tractor-trailer.

name: The Banana Splits Movie
summary_text: A family attends a live taping of The Banana Splits television series, but are forced to survive as soon as the characters go haywire and start a killing spree around the studio.

name: Angels in the Outfield
summary_text: When a boy prays for a chance to have a family if the California Angels win the pennant, angels are assigned to make that possible.

name: The Professor
summary_text: A college professor lives his life with reckless abandon after being diagnosed with a terminal illness.

name: DragonHeart
summary_text: The last dragon and a disillusioned dragonslaying Knight must cooperate to stop an evil King, who was given partial immortality.

name: The Family Man
summary_text: A fast-lane investment broker, offered the opportunity to see how the other half lives, wakes up to find that his sports car and girlfriend have become a mini-van and wife.

name: Stepmom
summary_text: A terminally-ill woman must deal with her ex-husband's new lover, who will be their children's stepmother.

name: Before the Devil Knows You're Dead
summary_text: When two brothers organize the robbery of their parents' jewelry store the job goes horribly wrong, triggering a series of events that sends them, their father and one brother's wife hurtling towards a shattering climax.

name: Drishyam 2
summary_text: A gripping tale of an investigation and a family which is threatened by it. Will Georgekutty be able to protect his family this time?

name: Amistad
summary_text: In 1839, the revolt of Mende captives aboard a Spanish owned ship causes a major controversy in the United States when the ship is captured off the coast of Long Island. The courts must decide whether the Mende are slaves or legally free.

name: Man Up
summary_text: A single woman takes the place of a stranger's blind date, which leads to her finding the perfect boyfriend.

name: Star Trek: The Motion Picture
summary_text: When an alien spacecraft of enormous power is spotted approaching Earth, Admiral James T. Kirk resumes command of the overhauled USS Enterprise in order to intercept it.

name: Orange County
summary_text: A guidance counselor mistakenly sends out the wrong transcripts to Stanford University under the name of an over-achieving high schooler.

name: The Time, the Place and the Girl
summary_text: The stuffy manager of lovely opera singer Vicki Cassel and her uncle, a classical conductor, is determined to close down the noisy nightclub that's next door to the Cassels' home. The ...                See full summary »

name: Marrowbone
summary_text: A young man and his three younger siblings, who have kept secret the death of their beloved mother in order to remain together, are plagued by a sinister presence in the sprawling manor in which they live.

name: Scanner Cop
summary_text: Sam Staziak, a rookie cop with the Los Angeles Police Department, is also a 'scanner' (psionic). When a string of murders begins to decimate the police department, Sam faces sensory ...                See full summary »

name: Underworld: Awakening
summary_text: When human forces discover the existence of the Vampire and Lycan clans, a war to eradicate both species commences. The vampire warrior Selene leads the battle against humankind.

name: Lucy in the Sky
summary_text: Astronaut Lucy Cola returns to Earth after a transcendent experience during a mission to space, and begins to lose touch with reality in a world that now seems too small.

name: The Fugitive
summary_text: A doctor, wrongly convicted for a murder he didn't commit, escapes custody and must stay ahead of the police to find the real killer.

name: The Block Island Sound
summary_text: Something lurks off the coast of Block Island, silently influencing the behavior of fisherman, Tom Lynch. After suffering a series of violent outbursts, he unknowingly puts his family in grave danger.

name: Milf
summary_text: A group of nerdy college guys who can't seem to connect with girls their own age discover the excitement of hooking up with sexy older women.

name: House at the End of the Street
summary_text: After moving with her mother to a small town, a teenager finds that an accident happened in the house at the end of the street. Things get more complicated when she befriends a boy. A double murder is not an accident.

name: John Dies at the End
summary_text: A new street drug that sends its users across time and dimensions has one drawback: some people return no longer human. Can two college drop-outs save humanity from this silent, otherworldly invasion?

name: Deadfall
summary_text: Cat burglar Henry Clarke and his accomplices, the Moreaus, attempt to steal diamonds from the château of millionaire Salinas. However, Henry's partners in crime aren't the most emotionally stable people.

name: John Q
summary_text: John Quincy Archibald takes a hospital emergency room hostage when his insurance won't cover his son's heart transplant.

name: High Maintenance
summary_text: A comedy that explores the private lives of unique New York individuals through a common thread: their weed deliveryman.

name: The Night Shift
summary_text: A group of doctors from the Army return to work the night shift at a hospital in San Antonio.

name: Murder at 1600
summary_text: A young woman is murdered in the White House. Homicide detective Regis (Wesley Snipes) investigates while Secret Service works against him. He's assigned agent Chance (Diane Lane). She eventually cooperates after a man's framed.

name: Get Shorty
summary_text: A mobster travels to Hollywood to collect a debt, and discovers that the movie business is much the same as his current job.

name: Rabid
summary_text: A young woman develops a taste for human blood after experimental plastic surgery, and her victims turn into blood-thirsty zombies, leading into a city-wide epidemic.

name: Madagascar: Escape 2 Africa
summary_text: The Madagascar animals fly back to New York City, but crash-land on an African nature reserve, where they meet others of their own kind, and Alex especially discovers his royal heritage as prince of a lion pride.

name: Bir Ada Masali
summary_text: The intersecting paths of Haziran, a city businesswoman, and Poyraz, the handsome and helpful young man of the island, on the Swallow Island. The love that will arise from the disagreements of the two with opposite characters.

name: Along Came a Spider
summary_text: When a senator's daughter under Secret Service protection is kidnapped from a private school, detective Alex Cross investigates the case even though he's recovering from the loss of his partner.

name: The Raid 2
summary_text: Only a short time after the first raid, Rama goes undercover with the thugs of Jakarta and plans to bring down the syndicate and uncover the corruption within his police force.

name: Madame Claude
summary_text: Paris, in the late 1960s. Madame Claude is at the head of a flourishing business dedicated to prostitution that gives her power over both the French political and criminal worlds. But the end of her empire is closer than she thinks.

name: Redeeming Love
summary_text: Based upon the novel by Francine Rivers.

name: Flower
summary_text: A sexually curious teen forms an unorthodox kinship with her mentally unstable stepbrother.

name: Seaspiracy
summary_text: Passionate about ocean life, a filmmaker sets out to document the harm that humans do to marine species - and uncovers alarming global corruption.

name: Crash Pad
summary_text: A hopeless romantic, who thinks he's found true love with an older woman, learns that she's married and that the fling is merely an instrument of revenge against her neglectful husband.

name: Malicious
summary_text: A widower and two of his sons become infatuated by their beautiful housekeeper, and all three set out to seduce her using their own unique methods.

name: Nurse
summary_text: By day, Abby Russell is a dedicated nurse, but by night, she lures cheating men to their brutal deaths and exposes them for who they really are.

name: Flag Day
summary_text: A father lives a double life as a counterfeiter, bank robber and con man in order to provide for his daughter.

name: Jakob's Wife
summary_text: Anne, married to a small-town Minister, feels her life has been shrinking over the past 30 years. Encountering "The Master" brings her a new sense of power and an appetite to live bolder. However, the change comes with a heavy body count.

name: Koi Jaane Na
summary_text: A heartbroken writer struggling with writer's block goes to a quiet hill station where he finds love again but uncovers a copycat serial killer who has mysteriously come alive and is killing everyone around him.

name: Spiral
summary_text: Follows criminal investigations in Paris from all the different points of view of those involved.

name: The Comeback
summary_text: An ex A-list celebrity attempts to rekindle the flame of her once prominent acting career with nothing but a camera crew and some determination.

name: Peggy Sue Got Married
summary_text: Peggy Sue faints at a high school reunion. When she wakes up, she finds herself in her own past, just before she finished school.

name: Exam
summary_text: Eight candidates for a highly desirable corporate job are locked together in an exam room and given a final test with just one seemingly simple question. However, it doesn't take long for confusion to ensue and tensions to unravel.

name: The Looming Tower
summary_text: A look at how the rivalry between the CIA and FBI inadvertently set the stage for the tragedy of 9/11 and the war in Afghanistan.

name: The Drew Carey Show
summary_text: A sitcom about Drew's personal and professional life.

name: My Left Nut
summary_text: Teenager Mick discovers a swelling on his testicle. He can't tell his Dad about it - he died 7 years ago. His Mum has a million other things on her plate. He can't tell his mates. What can he do about it?

name: The Ides of March
summary_text: An idealistic staffer for a new presidential candidate gets a crash course on dirty politics during his stint on the campaign trail.

name: Tinker Tailor Soldier Spy
summary_text: In the bleak days of the Cold War, espionage veteran George Smiley is forced out of semi-retirement to uncover a Soviet Agent within MI6's echelons.

name: Awake
summary_text: A man wakes in a hospital bed with no recollection of who he is, and learns that he's wanted by the police for committing a series of murders.

name: After Earth
summary_text: A crash landing leaves Kitai Raige and his father Cypher stranded on Earth, a millennium after events forced humanity's escape. With Cypher injured, Kitai must embark on a perilous journey to signal for help.

name: REC
summary_text: A television reporter and cameraman follow emergency workers into a dark apartment building and are quickly locked inside with something terrifying.

name: Sneakers
summary_text: A security pro finds his past coming back to haunt him, when he and his unique team are tasked with retrieving a particularly important item.

name: The Professionals
summary_text: An arrogant Texas millionaire hires four adventurers to rescue his kidnapped wife from a notorious Mexican bandit.

name: Deuce Bigalow: European Gigolo
summary_text: Deuce is tricked again into man-whoring by T.J., only in Amsterdam while other man-whores are being murdered in his midst.

name: Days of the Bagnold Summer
summary_text: A teenager spends his summer listening to heavy metal music and trying to get along with his librarian mom.

name: The Great North
summary_text: The adventures of a single dad and his weird Alaskan family.

name: Lake Placid
summary_text: Three people attempt to stop a gigantic crocodile, who is terrorizing residents in Black Lake, Maine.

name: 3 from Hell
summary_text: After barely surviving prison, the demented Firefly clan go on the run, unleashing a whole new wave of murder, madness and mayhem.

name: My Hero Academia Movie 3
summary_text: Izuku Midoriya has been framed for being a mass murderer.

name: The Comey Rule
summary_text: Jeff Daniels and Brendan Gleeson star as former FBI Dir. James Comey and President Donald J. Trump in this limited series of the story of two powerful men, whose strikingly different ethics and loyalties put them on a collision course.

name: Tank Girl
summary_text: A girl is among the few survivors of a dystopian Earth. Riding a war tank, she fights against the tyranny of a mega-corporation that dominates the remaining potable water supply of the planet.

name: Breathe
summary_text: This series just asks one question - how far will you go to protect the one you love. Two desperate and driven men must engage in the ultimate cat and mouse game to save the one they love.

name: Final Destination 3
summary_text: Six years after students cheated death, another teen has a premonition she and her friends will be involved in an accident. When the vision proves true, the student and survivors deal with the repercussions of cheating the Grim Reaper.

name: Little Giants
summary_text: Misfits form their own opposing team to an elite peewee football team, coached by the elite team coach's brother.

name: Dragon Fury
summary_text: A team of experts travels deep into the mountains to find a dangerous creature.

name: Man on a Ledge
summary_text: As a police psychologist works to talk down an ex-con who is threatening to jump from a Manhattan hotel rooftop, the biggest diamond heist ever committed is in motion.

name: Biohackers
summary_text: A fast-paced thriller following medical student Mia Akerlund who discovers the use of highly advanced biohacking technology in her university town.

name: Rumble
summary_text: In a world where monster wrestling is a global sport and monsters are superstar athletes, teenage Winnie seeks to follow in her father's footsteps by coaching a loveable underdog monster into a champion.

name: Don't Look Now
summary_text: A married couple grieving the recent death of their young daughter are in Venice when they encounter two elderly sisters, one of whom is psychic and brings a warning from beyond.

name: Pete's Dragon
summary_text: The adventures of an orphaned boy named Pete and his best friend Elliott, who happens to be a dragon.

name: At Eternity's Gate
summary_text: A look at the life of painter Vincent van Gogh during the time he lived in Arles and Auvers-sur-Oise, France.

name: Velvet Buzzsaw
summary_text: A satire set in the contemporary art world scene of Los Angeles, where big money artists and mega-collectors pay a high price when art collides with commerce.

name: A Most Wanted Man
summary_text: A Chechen Muslim illegally immigrates to Hamburg, where he gets caught in the international war on terror.

name: Deliver Us from Evil
summary_text: New York police officer Ralph Sarchie investigates a series of crimes. He joins forces with an unconventional priest, schooled in the rites of exorcism, to combat the possessions that are terrorizing their city.

name: Detroit: Become Human
summary_text: Take control of three androids in their quest to discover who they really are.

name: Singles
summary_text: A group of twenty-something friends search for love and success in grunge-era Seattle.

name: Invisible City
summary_text: An underground world is inhabited by mythical creatures evolved from a deep lineage of Brazilian folklore. One detective who finds himself caught in a murder investigation that puts him in the middle of a battle between these two worlds.

name: Precious
summary_text: In New York City's Harlem circa 1987, an overweight, abused, illiterate teen who is pregnant with her second child is invited to enroll in an alternative school in hopes that her life can head in a new direction.

name: Fermo posta Tinto Brass
summary_text: Tinto Brass receives letters containing real stories of women's erotic adventures which are subsequently transformed into short sex vignettes.

name: Happy Death Day 2U
summary_text: Tree Gelbman discovers that dying over and over was surprisingly easier than the dangers that lie ahead.

name: Bungou Stray Dogs
summary_text: Nakajima Atsushi was kicked out of his orphanage, and now he has no place to go and no food. While he is standing by a river, on the brink of starvation, he rescues a man whimsically ...                See full summary »

name: The SpongeBob SquarePants Movie
summary_text: SpongeBob SquarePants takes leave from the town of Bikini Bottom in order to track down King Neptune's stolen crown.

name: Paycheck
summary_text: What seemed like a breezy idea for an engineer to net him millions of dollars, leaves him on the run for his life and piecing together why he's being chased.

name: Sing Street
summary_text: A boy growing up in Dublin during the 1980s escapes his strained family life by starting a band to impress the mysterious girl he likes.

name: Persona
summary_text: A nurse is put in charge of a mute actress and finds that their personae are melding together.

name: Priest
summary_text: A priest disobeys church law to track down the vampires who kidnapped his niece.

name: Spencer
summary_text: During her Christmas holidays with the royal family at the Sandringham estate in Norfolk, England, Diana decides to leave her marriage to Prince Charles.

name: The Big Valley
summary_text: The Wild West adventures of the Barkley family in California's San Joaquin Valley.

name: Teenage Mutant Ninja Turtles
summary_text: Four ninja turtles, mutated by a mysterious alien substance, must rise up out of the sewers and defend their city against evil forces from both the past and present.

name: Fire Force
summary_text: A superhuman firefighter force is formed to deal with supernatural fire incidents.

name: Flashpoint
summary_text: The missions and trials of a Toronto police tactical unit.

name: Days of Thunder
summary_text: A young hot-shot stock car driver gets his chance to compete at the top level.

name: Blue's Clues
summary_text: Blue is a puppy who puts her paw prints on three clues. Steve or Joe has to deduce the clues (with the help of off-screen children) to figure out what Blue wants to do.

name: The Man from Nowhere
summary_text: A quiet pawnshop keeper with a violent past takes on a drug-and-organ trafficking ring in hope of saving the child who is his only friend.

name: Whitechapel
summary_text: A fast-tracked inspector, a hardened detective sergeant, and an expert in historical homicides investigate modern crimes with connections to the past in the Whitechapel district of London.

name: Last Knights
summary_text: A fallen warrior rises against a corrupt and sadistic ruler to avenge his dishonored master.

name: Chloe
summary_text: Suspecting her husband of infidelity, gynecologist Dr. Catherine Stewart hires an escort named Chloe in order to test his faithfulness. Soon, the relationships between all three intensify.

name: Role Models
summary_text: Wild behavior forces a pair of energy drink reps to enroll in a Big Brother program.

name: Anne of Green Gables
summary_text: An orphan girl, sent to an elderly brother and sister by mistake, charms her new home and community with her fiery spirit and imagination.

name: Tell It to the Bees
summary_text: In 1950s small town Britain, a doctor develops a relationship with her young patient's mother.

name: Yi Guyeokui Michin X
summary_text: Bothered to realize they are next-door neighbors and share a psychiatrist, a man and a woman find it's impossible to stay out of each other's way.

name: Think Like a Man
summary_text: Four friends conspire to turn the tables on their women when they discover the ladies have been using Steve Harvey's relationship advice against them.

name: Colossal
summary_text: Gloria is an out-of-work party girl forced to leave her life in New York City and move back home. When reports surface that a giant creature is destroying Seoul, she gradually comes to the realization that she is somehow connected to this phenomenon.

name: What's Wrong with Secretary Kim
summary_text: A romance between perfect but narcissistic second generation heir and his capable assistant.

name: Down to Earth with Zac Efron
summary_text: In this travel show, actor Zac Efron journeys around the world with wellness expert Darin Olien in search of healthy, sustainable ways to live.

name: A Nightmare on Elm Street 3: Dream Warriors
summary_text: A psychiatrist familiar with knife-wielding dream demon Freddy Krueger helps teens at a mental hospital battle the killer who is invading their dreams.

name: Bride of Chucky
summary_text: Chucky, the doll possessed by a serial killer, discovers the perfect mate to kill and revive into the body of another doll.

name: Diamonds Are Forever
summary_text: A diamond smuggling investigation leads James Bond to Las Vegas, where he uncovers an evil plot involving a rich business tycoon.

name: The Crush
summary_text: A journalist becomes the unwanted center of attention for a 14-year-old girl, who proceeds to sabotage his life after he refuses her sexual advances.

name: The Room
summary_text: Matt and Kate buy an isolated house. While moving, they discover a strange room that grants them an unlimited number of material wishes. But, since Kate has had two miscarriages, what they miss the most is a child.

name: The Addams Family 2
summary_text: The Addams get tangled up in more wacky adventures and find themselves involved in hilarious run-ins with all sorts of unsuspecting characters. Sequel to the 2019 animated film, 'The Addams Family'.

name: Between
summary_text: After a mysterious disease kills every resident over 22 years old, survivors of a town must fend for themselves when the government quarantines them

name: The Doorman
summary_text: A woman returns from combat and befriends a family in NYC. A gang of thieves plot to take the family's valuables, and she is all that stands between them and their lives.

name: The Escort
summary_text: Desperate for a good story, a sex-addicted journalist throws himself into the world of high-class escorts when he starts following a Stanford-educated prostitute.

name: Anon
summary_text: In a world without anonymity or crime, a detective meets a woman who threatens their security.

name: Lords of Chaos
summary_text: A teenager's quest to launch Norwegian Black Metal in Oslo in the early 1990s results in a very violent outcome.

name: Sinister 2
summary_text: A young mother and her twin sons move into a rural house that's marked for death.

name: Assault on Precinct 13
summary_text: A police sergeant must rally the cops and prisoners together to protect themselves on New Year's Eve, just as corrupt policeman surround the station with the intent of killing all to keep their deception in the ranks.

name: Major Grom: Plague Doctor
summary_text: Police Major Igor Grom is known throughout St. Petersburg for his penetrative character and irreconcilable attitude towards criminals of all stripes. But everything changes dramatically ...                See full summary »

name: Brothers by Blood
summary_text: A tale of family, friendships and betrayal in the violent world of the Philadelphia mob.

name: UFO
summary_text: The missions of the Supreme Headquarters Alien Defence Organization, which defends Earth from extra-terrestrial threats.

name: The Black Scorpion
summary_text: Volcanic activity frees giant scorpions from the earth who wreak havoc in the rural countryside and eventually threaten Mexico City.

name: Death at a Funeral
summary_text: Chaos ensues when a man tries to expose a dark secret regarding a recently deceased patriarch of a dysfunctional British family.

name: Miami Vice
summary_text: Based on the 1980s TV action/drama, this update focuses on vice detectives Crockett and Tubbs as their respective personal and professional lives become dangerously intertwined.

name: Frankenstein 1970
summary_text: Needing money, the last of the Frankensteins leases his castle out to a film company as he tries to complete his ancestor's gruesome experiments at creating life.

name: Arkansas
summary_text: Kyle and Swin live by the orders of an Arkansas-based drug kingpin named Frog, whom they've never met. But when a deal goes horribly wrong, the consequences are deadly.

name: Disclosure
summary_text: A computer specialist is sued for sexual harassment by a former lover turned boss who initiated the act forcefully, which threatens both his career and his personal life.

name: Gettysburg
summary_text: In 1863, the Northern and Southern forces fight at Gettysburg in the decisive battle of the American Civil War.

name: Magic Mike XXL
summary_text: Three years after Mike bowed out of the stripper life at the top of his game, he and the remaining Kings of Tampa hit the road to Myrtle Beach to put on one last blow-out performance.

name: Deadpool 3
summary_text: The film is rumored to involve another popular group in the X-Men mythos, X-Force.

name: Desire
summary_text: Lucía and Ofelia, two sisters, finally meet after 7 years at Lucia's wedding. But when Juan, Lucia's husband, and Ofelia meet, they feel like a disruptive fantasy have enchanted their minds and bodies...

name: Frank of Ireland
summary_text: A 32-year-old misanthropic musician named Frank lives in Dublin with his mother.

name: Crocodile Dundee II
summary_text: Australian outback expert protects his New York love from gangsters who've followed her down under.

name: Deep Blue Sea 3
summary_text: Studying the effects of climate change off the coast of Mozambique, a marine biologist and her team confront three genetically enhanced bull sharks. Now, a new bloodbath is waiting to happen in the name of science. Will humans never learn?

name: Music and Lyrics
summary_text: A washed up singer is given a couple days to compose a chart-topping hit for an aspiring teen sensation. Though he's never written a decent lyric in his life, he sparks with an offbeat younger woman with a flair for words.

name: The Natural
summary_text: A middle-aged unknown comes seemingly out of nowhere to become a legendary baseball player with almost supernatural talent.

name: The Color of Money
summary_text: Fast Eddie Felson teaches a cocky but immensely talented protégé the ropes of pool hustling, which in turn inspires him to make an unlikely comeback.

name: Mindhunters
summary_text: Trainees in the FBI's psychological profiling program must put their training into practice when they discover a killer in their midst.

name: Inland Empire
summary_text: As an actress begins to adopt the persona of her character in a film, her world becomes nightmarish and surreal.

name: Brockmire
summary_text: A famed major league baseball announcer who suffers an embarrassing and very public meltdown live on the air after discovering his beloved wife's serial infidelity decides to reclaim his career and love life in a small town a decade later.

name: Hot Shots!
summary_text: A parody of Top Gun (1986) in which a talented but unstable fighter pilot must overcome the ghosts of his father and save a mission sabotaged by greedy weapons manufacturers.

name: Sirens
summary_text: When a painting is termed blasphemous, a young minister and his wife visit the artist... and the three sexually playful models living with him.

name: P.S. I Love You
summary_text: A young widow discovers that her late husband has left her 10 messages intended to help ease her pain and start a new life.

name: The Boys in the Band
summary_text: At a birthday party in 1968 New York, a surprise guest and a drunken game leave seven gay friends reckoning with unspoken feelings and buried truths.

name: Congo
summary_text: When an expedition to the African Congo ends in disaster, a new team is assembled to find out what went wrong.

name: Dollhouse
summary_text: A futuristic laboratory has erased the identities of lost young people, and now imprints them with the temporary identities they need to fulfill assignments for clients.

name: Class
summary_text: A young man in private school spends one crazy night out, but soon realizes the woman he hooked up with is not who he expected.

name: Antares
summary_text: Three stories revolve around the love lives of an adulterous woman, a checkout girl and a single mother.

name: SeaQuest 2032
summary_text: In the early 21st century, mankind has colonized the oceans. The United Earth Oceans Organization enlists Captain Nathan Bridger and the submarine seaQuest DSV to keep the peace and explore the last frontier on Earth.

name: The Last Emperor
summary_text: The story of the final Emperor of China.

name: Sunrise at Campobello
summary_text: After a bout with polio, future president Franklin D. Roosevelt fights to save his political career.

name: Patton
summary_text: The World War II phase of the career of controversial American general George S. Patton.

name: Sydney to the Max
summary_text: Set in the present day with flashbacks to the 1990s, the comedy revolves around outgoing middle-schooler Sydney Reynolds, who lives with her single dad Max and her progressive grandmother Judy--three generations under one roof.

name: Das Boot
summary_text: An inexperienced U-boat crew has to survive a secret mission and a young German woman is torn between loyalty for her home country and the French resistance in the WWII drama.

name: The 'Burbs
summary_text: An overstressed suburbanite and his neighbors are convinced that the new family on the block are part of a murderous Satanic cult.

name: Free Fire
summary_text: Set in Boston in 1978, a meeting in a deserted warehouse between two gangs turns into a shoot-out and a game of survival.

name: Derek DelGaudio's In & Of Itself
summary_text: Storyteller and Conceptual Magician Derek DelGaudio attempts to understand the illusory nature of identity and answer the deceptively simple question 'Who am I?'

name: Fletch
summary_text: Irwin M. "Fletch" Fletcher is a newspaper reporter being offered a large sum to off a cancerous millionaire, but is on the run, risking his job and finding clues when it's clear the man is healthy.

name: One Wild Moment
summary_text: Two friends bring their daughters with them on a beach vacation and find themselves in an awkward situation. A remake of the 1977 film "Un moment d'égarement".

name: Star Wars Jedi: Fallen Order
summary_text: Set shortly after Revenge of the Sith, the player takes on the role of a Jedi padawan being hunted by the Empire after Order 66.

name: Night Stalker: The Hunt for a Serial Killer
summary_text: This limited docu-series tells the true story of how one of the most notorious serial killers in American history was hunted down and brought to justice.

name: The Indian in the Cupboard
summary_text: Omri, a young boy growing up in Brooklyn, receives an odd variety of presents for his birthday: a wooden cabinet from his older brother, a set of antique keys from his mother and a tiny plastic model of an Indian from his best friend Patrick.

name: The Belko Experiment
summary_text: In a twisted social experiment, eighty Americans are locked in their high-rise corporate office in Bogotá, Colombia, and ordered by an unknown voice coming from the company's intercom system to participate in a deadly game of kill or be killed.

name: Just the Ten of Us
summary_text: Gym teacher Graham Lubbock and his wife Elizabeth live in Eureka, California with their eight children.

name: The Skeleton Key
summary_text: A hospice nurse working at a spooky New Orleans plantation home finds herself entangled in a mystery involving the house's dark past.

name: Fatma
summary_text: As Fatma sets out to search for Zafer, she commits an unexpected murder and she has to keep killing in order to survive.

name: Oliver!
summary_text: After being sold to a mortician, young orphan Oliver Twist runs away and meets a group of boys trained to be pickpockets by an elderly mentor.

name: Café Society
summary_text: In the 1930s, a Bronx native moves to Hollywood and falls in love with a young woman who is seeing a married man.

name: Teenage Bounty Hunters
summary_text: After joining forces with a veteran bounty hunter, sixteen-year-old fraternal twin sisters Sterling and Blair dive into the world of bail skipping baddies while still navigating the high stakes of teenage life.

name: Karen
summary_text: A racist woman takes it as a personal mission to displace the new Black family that just moved into the neighborhood: they won't back down without a fight.

name: Star Trek: First Contact
summary_text: The Borg travel back in time intent on preventing Earth's first contact with an alien species. Captain Picard and his crew pursue them to ensure that Zefram Cochrane makes his maiden flight reaching warp speed.

name: The Masked Singer
summary_text: A singing competition guessing game based on Korean format King of Mask Singer. 12 celebrity performers wear costumes to conceal identities. One singer is eliminated each week and unmasked. Small hints are given for the viewer guess along.

name: Horimiya
summary_text: Two very different people - an academically successful schoolgirl and a quiet loser schoolboy - meet and develop a friendship.

name: Settlers
summary_text: Mankind's earliest settlers on the Martian frontier do what they must to survive the cosmic elements and each other.

name: Vampires vs. the Bronx
summary_text: A group of young friends from the Bronx fight to save their neighborhood from gentrification...and vampires.

name: Wellington Paranormal
summary_text: Sergeant Maaka and Officers Minogue and O'Leary are members of the Wellington, New Zealand, police. Their job is to investigate paranormal phenomena.

name: The Insider
summary_text: A research chemist comes under personal and professional attack when he decides to appear in a 60 Minutes exposé on Big Tobacco.

name: Ginger Snaps
summary_text: Two death-obsessed sisters, outcasts in their suburban neighborhood, must deal with the tragic consequences when one of them is bitten by a deadly werewolf.

name: The Ghost and the Darkness
summary_text: A bridge engineer and an experienced old hunter begin a hunt for two lions after they start attacking local construction workers.

name: Becker
summary_text: Dr. John Becker goes through his daily routine of being a doctor, stopping at his favorite diner, and other various situations, all the while hating life and everything around him.

name: Innerspace
summary_text: A test pilot is miniaturized in a secret experiment, and accidentally injected into a hapless store clerk.

name: Nuevo rico, nuevo pobre
summary_text: Brian and Andrés are separated at birth with different families. Andrés grows up in a rich family as a pedantic man. Brian grows up in a poor family as a carefree man. As adults, they are ...                See full summary »

name: Top Chef
summary_text: A reality competition show in which chefs compete against one another in culinary challenges and are a judged by a panel of food and wine experts, with one or more contestants eliminated each episode.

name: Sharknado
summary_text: When a freak hurricane swamps Los Angeles, nature's deadliest killer rules sea, land, and air as thousands of sharks terrorize the waterlogged populace.

name: China Beach
summary_text: The trials of a weary nurse, her friends and colleagues in a Vietnam War field hospital.

name: Kickin' It
summary_text: A once-in-a-generation young karate fighter named Jack joins the Wasabi warriors.

name: American Mary
summary_text: The allure of easy money sends Mary Mason, a medical student, into the world of underground surgeries which ends up leaving more marks on her than her so-called "freakish" clients.

name: White Lightning
summary_text: An ex con teams up with federal agents to help them with breaking up a moonshine ring.

name: It's Kind of a Funny Story
summary_text: A clinically depressed teenager gets a new start after he checks himself into an adult psychiatric ward.

name: The Glades
summary_text: A former Chicago cop moves to a small Florida town and joins the state police.

name: Single White Female
summary_text: A woman advertising for a new roommate finds that something very strange is going on with the tenant who decides to move in.

name: The I-Land
summary_text: When ten people wake up on a treacherous island with no memory of who they are and how they got there, they set off on a trek to try to get back home, only to discover the world is not as it seems.

name: Come Undone
summary_text: One day at a colleague's going away party, Anna meets Domenico, a virile, slightly older chap who's married with two small kids. Passion's flames are rapidly kindled and result in steamy encounters.

name: Jumanji: Level One
summary_text: Takes place in 1869, before the events of the original movie. It will finally reveal how the cursed game came to be and the adventures of the first people who played Jumanji.

name: Letters from Iwo Jima
summary_text: The story of the battle of Iwo Jima between the United States and Imperial Japan during World War II, as told from the perspective of the Japanese who fought it.

name: The Cider House Rules
summary_text: A compassionate young man, raised in an orphanage and trained to be a doctor there, decides to leave to see the world.

name: To Live and Die in L.A.
summary_text: A fearless Secret Service agent will stop at nothing to bring down the counterfeiter who killed his partner.

name: Little Fish
summary_text: A couple fights to hold their relationship together as a memory loss virus spreads and threatens to erase the history of their love and courtship.

name: Girl
summary_text: A young woman returns to her small hometown intent on killing her abusive father only to discover someone murdered him the day before. As the girl searches for answers, she uncovers a family legacy more dangerous than she'd imagined.

name: Almost Paradise
summary_text: A former DEA agent forced into early retirement runs a gift shop in in the Philippines.

name: The November Man
summary_text: An ex-C.I.A. operative is brought back in on a very personal mission and finds himself pitted against his former pupil in a deadly game involving high level C.I.A. officials and the Russian President-elect.

name: A Perfect Murder
summary_text: A wealthy Wall Street speculator discovers that his wife has a lover. He investigates him and uses the carrot and stick to make him murder his wife. Planned to detail, it seems like a perfect murder.

name: The Collector
summary_text: Desperate to repay his debt to his ex-wife, an ex-con plots a heist at his new employer's country home, unaware that a second criminal has also targeted the property, and rigged it with a series of deadly traps.

name: Scooby-Doo! Curse of the Lake Monster
summary_text: School is out and the familiar Scooby gang are looking to enjoy a long vacation. However, sightings of a Lake Monster cause them to band together once again to solve yet another mystery.

name: Kenobi: A Star Wars Story
summary_text: After years in hiding, Obi-Wan Kenobi struggles to reconnect with the Force in order to protect Luke Skywalker from Imperial forces.

name: The Shack
summary_text: A grieving man receives a mysterious, personal invitation to meet with God at a place called "The Shack."

name: Portlandia
summary_text: A sketch-comedy series that parodies life in Portland, Oregon.

name: Rob Roy
summary_text: In 1713 Scotland, Rob Roy MacGregor is wronged by a nobleman and his nephew, becomes an outlaw in search of revenge while fleeing the Redcoats, and faces charges of being a Jacobite.

name: 3000 Miles to Graceland
summary_text: A gang of ex-cons rob a casino during Elvis convention week.

name: The Human Centipede III (Final Sequence)
summary_text: Taking inspiration from The Human Centipede films, the warden of a notorious and troubled prison looks to create a 500-person human centipede as a solution to his problems.

name: The Roommate
summary_text: When college freshman Sara arrives on campus for the first time, she befriends her roommate, Rebecca, unaware that the girl is becoming dangerously obsessed with her.

name: Dabbe: Cin Çarpmasi
summary_text: Preparing for her wedding, Kübra gets possessed by unknown livings. To cure Kübra, a psychiatrist, Ebru, gets on way. Ebru is also an old friend of Kübra. Ebru would work together with an ...                See full summary »

name: Like Stars on Earth
summary_text: An eight-year-old boy is thought to be a lazy trouble-maker, until the new art teacher has the patience and compassion to discover the real problem behind his struggles in school.

name: He's All That
summary_text: A teenage girl sets out to give a nebbish classmate the ultimate high school makeover. An updated remake of the 1999 film, 'She's All That'.

name: The Fallout
summary_text: High schooler Vada navigates the emotional fallout she experiences in the wake of a school tragedy. Relationships with her family, friends and view of the world are forever altered.

name: The Poison Rose
summary_text: Inspired by classic film noir, Carson Phillips, an ex-football star turned PI, has a soft spot for a lady in distress.

name: Chemical Hearts
summary_text: A high-school transfer student finds a new passion when she begins to work on the school's newspaper.

name: Vikings: The Viking Sagas
summary_text: Add a Plot

name: Megan Is Missing
summary_text: Two teenage girls encounter an Internet child predator.

name: Afternoon Delight
summary_text: Rachel tries to spice up her marriage with a trip to a strip club. She befriends McKenna who gave her a lapdance. She moves in with Rachel's family and becomes a nanny for the son.

name: The Hot Spot
summary_text: Upon arriving to a small town, a drifter quickly gets into trouble with the local authorities - and the local women - after he robs a bank.

name: We Bought a Zoo
summary_text: Set in Southern California, a father moves his young family to the countryside to renovate and re-open a struggling zoo.

name: Restless Natives
summary_text: Two Scottish friends become local folk heroes and tourist attractions when they start holding up tour buses with novelty items.

name: Waking the Dead
summary_text: Detective Superintendent Peter Boyd is the leader of a Police team which investigates unsolved murders using modern technology.

name: A Baker's Son
summary_text: Lowell Hawthorne's rags to riches story of how he got Golden Krust to be the most successful multi-million dollar Caribbean franchise across the US.

name: Arthdal Chronicles
summary_text: Arthdal Chronicles depicts the birth of civilization and nations in ancient times. It is a story of mythical heroes, their struggle, unity and love of people living in a virtual land called Arth.

name: Saints & Sinners
summary_text: A Southern Baptist church and its surrounding community are entrenched in a world of crime, lust, deceit, and greed.

name: Love Wedding Repeat
summary_text: While trying to make his sister's wedding day go smoothly, Jack finds himself juggling an angry ex-girlfriend, an uninvited guest with a secret, a misplaced sleep sedative, and the girl that got away in alternate versions of the same day.

name: Out of Time
summary_text: Three mysterious figures emerge from the Mojave Desert and make their way to Los Angeles, leaving a trail of bodies in their path. To thwart their plans for global genocide, a mysteriously ...                See full summary »

name: Mother
summary_text: A mother desperately searches for the killer who framed her son for a girl's horrific murder.

name: After Love
summary_text: Set in the port town of Dover, Mary Hussain suddenly finds herself a widow following the unexpected death of her husband. A day after the burial, she discovers he has a secret just twenty-one miles across the English Channel in Calais.

name: Tolkien
summary_text: The formative years of the orphaned author J.R.R. Tolkien as he finds friendship, love and artistic inspiration among a group of fellow outcasts at school.

name: The Bridge on the River Kwai
summary_text: British POWs are forced to build a railway bridge across the river Kwai for their Japanese captors, not knowing that the allied forces are planning to destroy it.

name: Fantasy Island
summary_text: People who walk in with a desire, but end up reborn to themselves through the magical realism of Fantasy Island.

name: Deep State
summary_text: What happens when a man who believes he has retired from MI6 is called back to do one more job to regain his life, only to discover that this job may mean he has no life to go back to.

name: Strange Days
summary_text: A former cop turned street-hustler accidentally uncovers a conspiracy in Los Angeles in 1999.

name: Angry Birds
summary_text: When an island populated by happy, flightless birds is visited by mysterious green piggies, it's up to three unlikely outcasts - Red, Chuck and Bomb - to figure out what the pigs are up to.

name: Horton Hears a Who!
summary_text: Horton the Elephant struggles to protect a microscopic community from his neighbors who refuse to believe it exists.

name: Just Before I Go
summary_text: On the verge of giving up on life, a guy travels to his hometown to make amends.

name: Lady and the Tramp
summary_text: The romantic tale of a sheltered uptown Cocker Spaniel dog and a streetwise downtown Mutt.

name: Bridget Jones's Baby
summary_text: Forty-something and single again, Bridget decides to focus on her job and surround herself with friends. In a twist, she finds herself pregnant, but with one hitch - she can only be fifty percent sure of the identity of her baby's father.
